doc.title: 21st Century Jet: The Building of the 777
doc.plot: The design, construction, certification, and marketing of the Boeing 777 jetliner is chronicled in this documentary TV mini-series. Plenty of behind-the-scenes footage of the CAD (computer-assisted-design) process, the construction and testing of the prototype, and the test flights.

The design, construction, certification, and marketing of the Boeing 777 jetliner is chronicled in this documentary TV mini-series. Plenty of behind-the-scenes footage of the CAD (computer-assisted-design) process, the construction and testing of the prototype, and the test flights.
